body:
Comment 7 by **ciserlohn**: 
If the policy for the main and the tool repository is the same, why does the main
repository has a go1.2 tag whereas the tools repository has not?

However, using the head branch in the MacPorts port of go will likely result in
different builds depending on the installation time (because the latest commit on the
branch could be different). But I'd like the MacPorts version to be same regardless of
the installation time. Having a tag on the tools repository would make that much easier
with regard to bundling the godoc and vet command with port.
